title: Drawing, "Design for a Woven Textile with Dome or Planet Shapes"
inscribed: Inscribed (sideways) in graphite on verso, lower left corner:  Mo: Janice 9 - 2:30/Tru 10 -11:30 1 - 2:30/Tue:  Janice 9 - 2:30/Trude 10 - 2:30/Thurs Janice 9 - 12:30 - 1:30/Trude 9:30 - 10:30 - 1:30
creditline: Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives
description: Two partial spheres; black at top, blue at bottom, suggestions of brown, orange and yellow mountains in between spheres.

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, "Design for a Woven Textile with Dome or Planet Shapes".Crayon on coated tracing paper. Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives. 1993-121-98.
